about_the_game:
Contents of KingSim soundtrack DLC:

1. Denis Popov - KingSim Ambient Track
2. Denis Popov - KingSim Sawmill Track
3. Denis Popov - Funeral March
4. Andrea Baroni - The Source of Mana
5. Andrea Baroni - Yet Another Journey
6. Andrea Baroni - Deep in the caves below
7. Andrea Baroni - Don't Fall Off The Clouds
8. GwriterStudio - Woodland Entrance
9. GwriterStudio - Flower of life
10. Dope Data - Knight
11. Dope Data - Eatery
12. Dope Data - Gods Blessing
13. Dope Data - Insomnia
14. Dope Data - The End
15. Sound Phenomenon - 8-bit Cinematic
16. Sound Phenomenon - Country Fair

All the music is in the MP3 format.

All the revenue gained from the sales of this DLC go directly to the music creators, the developer is taking nothing for himself.
So if you want to say "thanks" to all the people who made music for KingSim - this DLC is a must-buy!

name: KingSim Soundtrack
short_description: The soundtrack used in the game about making tough King decision - KingSim.
